Posts.Content: You know your body and what is best for you as I do and that is why I had a double Mas. I so agree with you about the quality of life. I took myself off Arimidex a couple weeks ago. It is amazing how much better I feel. I gave it 2 years and couldn't face 3 more in such pain. Best wishes to you.Â
Posts.Title: Third lumpectomy

Posts.Content: I am curious as to why you would put yourself through this. I had a double mastectomy 2 years ago, I chose not to have reconstruction, but it is certainly available.
Posts.Title: Third lumpectomy

Posts.Content: I have had a double mastectomy,but would like to know why you are doing it.
Posts.Title: elective double masectomy
